IrvingJS

A headless framework

Irving is an integrated, React-based framework for building single-page applications. Irving gives you all the power of isomorphic JavaScript while allowing full control over component layouts with a content management system like WordPress.

  • Demo
  • Documentation
  • Source

Built With Irving

features

Built With Irving

  • Fast

    Single-page apps load fast without sacrificing functionality.

  • Easy

    Build and style your site with React, create simple layouts and content with WordPress, and leave the configuration to Irving.

  • Compatible

    Isomorphic rendering and semantic markup thatâ€™s accessible for users, friendly for search engines, and can be deployed to any Node.js hosting system.
